backend/main.mo: Defines a canister storing CaseRecord entries in a Map and exposes addRecord and getAllRecords functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and requirement IDs for QR and deployment functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one-line summaries for major frontend files including features, hooks, utilities, and config.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Explains how to obtain and share the live deployment URL and how to test QR code generation and scanning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with OKLCH color variables supporting light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling between LoginPage and DashboardPage based on authentication state.
frontend/src/backend/backend.did.js: Defines Candid interface for the backend canister including addRecord and getAllRecords.
frontend/src/backend/index.ts: Provides createActor utility for initializing the backend canister actor with HttpAgent options.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login form validating fixed credentials and displaying UI feedback via shadcn/ui components.
React Query hooks for fetching and adding case records using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/cases/RecordedCase: Renders sortable case records table with CSV export capability.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard combining manual notes, QR scanner card, live link copy, and case records table.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/ScannerC: Camera-based QR scanner and manual entry form that parses QR payloads, autofills fields, and can generate QR codes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file kept for project structure consistency.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports case records to a downloadable CSV file with proper value escaping and sorting.
frontend/src/lib/liveLink.ts: Provides utilities to get the current site URL and copy text to the clipboard with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/qrGenerator.ts: Loads a QR code generator library from CDN and produces QR code SVG strings.
frontend/src/lib/qrPayload.ts: Encodes and decodes QR payloads in a pipe-delimited Name|Case|Crime|Date format.
frontend/src/lib/sfx.ts: Plays a cached beep sound, cloning audio nodes to allow rapid repeats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s version, goals, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues for building a browser‑based CJM Case Management System. Serves as a centralized specification for current functionality and implementation guidelines.
